fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Protect a player, nullifying the abilities of one faction's visits to that target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only nullify the abilities of one opposing faction each night. You may choose which faction this is, and you may select "Neutral" to nullify the abilities of neutral visitors.
- Filtered players will still visit, but their visit will do nothing. This includes attacks.
- Filtered players are notified that they were filtered.
- You may nullify visitors to yourself two times in conjunction with your normal ability. The nullified faction remains the same.
